mapper.select: select *, i.no as hno from housedeal h right outer join houseinfo i on h.aptname=i.aptname where h.dong = #{dongcode} and i.dong= #{dongcode} order by dealYear desc, dealMonth desc, dealDay desc
select * from housedeal h left outer join houseinfo i on h.AptName=i.AptName where h.aptname like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%') order by dealYear desc, dealMonth desc, dealDay desc limit 6

SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(#{lng})-radians(lit))+sin(radians(lat))*sin(radians(#{lat})))) AS distance FROM parkinfo HAVING distance <= 1 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 20;

SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(#{lng})-radians(lit))+sin(radians(lat))*sin(radians(#{lat})))) AS distance FROM market HAVING distance <= 1 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 20;

SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(#{lng})-radians(lit))+sin(radians(lat))*sin(radians(#{lat})))) AS distance FROM busstop HAVING distance <= 1 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 20;

SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(#{lng})-radians(lit))+sin(radians(lat))*sin(radians(#{lat})))) AS distance FROM policeinfo HAVING distance <= 2 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 20;

SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(#{lng})-radians(lit))+sin(radians(lat))*sin(radians(#{lat})))) AS distance FROM subwayinfo HAVING distance <= 1 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 20;
select * from houseinfo where Aptname like concat('%', #{AptName}, '%')

select *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(#{lng})-radians(lng))+sin(radians(lat))*sin(radians(#{lat})))) AS distance from (select * from houseinfo where #{dong} = dong) r HAVING distance <= 30 ORDER BY distance
